name: Janet Jackson Multiple Choice Quiz | 15 Questions

questions.text: What was the title of Janet Jackson's movie debut ?
questions.explanation:
Poetic Justice & poetic justice.

	Janet made her movie debut in Singleton's Poetic Justice, in a role very unlike her musical persona

questions.text: Who co-starred in the above mentioned film with Janet ?
questions.explanation:
Tupac Shakur.

	Yes that was the late rapper Tupac in the film also

questions.text: Finish the title of this Janet album Rhythm Nation _____ ?
questions.explanation:
1814.

	18 is the number of the letter R and 14 is for N hence the initials for Rhythm Nation

questions.text: What was the title of the duet she recorded with brother Michael Jackson ?
questions.explanation:
Scream & scream.

	That was the title of their only duet included on Michael's album History

questions.text: On which tv show did Janet star as a dance student ?
questions.explanation:
Fame.

	an early and rare tv appearance

questions.text: On which TV show did Janet portray Penny ?
questions.explanation:
Good Times.

	She was The Neighbor's daughter who fell madly in love with JJ Evans.

questions.text: What is the title of Janet's greatest hits album ?
questions.explanation:
Design Of A Decade.

	Design was released in the mid 90's and was very successful.

questions.text: What was the name of Janet's album containing the hits Nasty and When I Think Of You ?
questions.explanation:
Control & control.

	Jnaet was making a statement that she was in control of her music and her life and boy what a statement.

questions.text: Janet played Willis' girlfriend Charlene on which popular 80's sitcom ?
questions.correct: Different Strokes & different strokes & Diff'rent Strokes & diff'rent strokes & diffrent strokes
questions.explanation:
Different Strokes & different strokes & Diff'rent Strokes & diff'rent strokes & diffrent strokes.

	What you talking 'bout Willis ....

questions.text: Who choreographed the video Nasty and even appears in the video ?
questions.explanation:
Paula Abdul.

	That was Paula, Tina actually worked with Janet a few years later.

questions.text: Which punctuation mark finishes the title of a 1993 release Janet _ ?
questions.explanation:
.(period)

	simply titled janet. contained the hit Thats The Way Love Goes.

questions.text: In what state was Janet born ?
questions.explanation:
Indiana.

	Born May 16, 1966 in Gary Indiana.

questions.text: Which song is this lyric from 'Like a moth to the flame burned by the fire' ?
questions.explanation:
That's The Way Love Goes.

	'my love is blind can't you see my desire'

questions.text: Which music video featured Cab Calloway and Heavy D and that famous handkerchief dance ?
questions.explanation:
Alright.

	a great video with some awesome choreography

questions.text: Which music video features Janet on the beach with actor Antonio Sabato Jr. ?
questions.explanation:
Love Will Never Do (Without You).

	another in a long line of great music videos.
